description:
The unit test for the os-tenant-networks API is only covering the delete operation, it's missing the other actions in that API.  We should add unit test coverage for those.

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/tests/unit/api/openstack/compute/contrib/test_tenant_networks.py
title: test_tenant_networks.py coverage is pretty sad

comments.content:
The unit test for the os-tenant-networks API is only covering the delete operation, it's missing the other actions in that API.  We should add unit test coverage for those.
